definition: Nan Quan Mama, a Taiwanese Music Group
mama-san, middle-aged woman who runs a brothel, bar etc (loanword from Japanese)/madam

sentences.english: Yang Lei's mother supported her daughter's decision.
sentences.chinese: 楊雷的媽媽支持她女兒的選擇。

sentences.english: The girl threaded the needle for her mother.
Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心媽媽那邊，這一次我會爲你掩護的。

sentences.english: My mother is white in hair。
sentences.chinese: 家中的老媽媽已是滿頭白髮。

sentences.english: Her mom replied, “Because they love each other.” MMT
sentences.chinese: 她的媽媽回答道，“因爲他們彼此相愛。”

sentences.english: Well, it’s just that your mom was always bugging you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我想大概是你媽媽以前總在在你耳邊嘮叨的關係吧。

sentences.english: Mother often makes dumpling filling with cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽常用捲心菜做餃子餡。

sentences.english: Mom said you should get married.
Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凱利柯克是一位作家，麪包師，媽媽和人力資源經理。

sentences.english: She resembles her mother in the way she moves her hands when she talks.
sentences.chinese: 她說話時打手勢的動作像她媽媽。

sentences.english: It was then I noticed tears glistening on my mother's cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 恰在此時，我看到媽媽的面頰上閃着晶瑩的淚光。

sentences.english: Baby giant pandas spend a lot of time drinking their mum's milk.
sentences.chinese: 小熊貓花費大量的時間喝他們媽媽的奶水。

sentences.english: My mother looked at me this moring.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽今天早上來看我。

sentences.english: They don't want to arrive home to a needy mother, she says.
sentences.chinese: 他們不希望回到家來又看到媽媽窮困疲憊。

sentences.english: He and my mama wrapped him in my baseball jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他和我的媽媽把斯齊普裹在我的棒球衫裏。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
